committee_name: Committee on Transportation and the Environment
address: 1350 Pennsylvania Avenue, N.W., Suite 108, Washington, DC 20004
hearing_notice_body: to receive testimony on-street parking in the District and the District Department of Transportation's parking program and Parking Action Agenda. Topics will include residential parking, visitor parking, commercial parking, performance parking, and accessible parking.
committee_contact: Aukima Benjamin, staff assistant to the Committee on Transportation and the Environment
